traits.name: Assassin
traits.innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the enemy backline.
traits.description: Assassin's Abilities can critically strike and they gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and bonus Critical Strike Damage.

traits.name: Caretaker
traits.description: Caretakers deploy with a Baby Dragon that can be placed anywhere on the battlefield. The Baby Dragon gains 80% of its Caretaker's Attack Speed, and restores 80 Mana to the Caretaker upon death.

traits.name: Brawler
traits.description: Brawlers gain additional maximum Health.

traits.name: Cavalier
traits.innate: Innate: Cavaliers charge quickly towards their target whenever they move.
traits.description: Cavaliers take reduced damage. At the start of combat and after each charge, this effect is doubled for 4 seconds.

traits.name: Cruel
traits.description: A Cruel champion hungers to be alone against exactly 1 enemy left standing.

traits.name: God-King
traits.description: God-Kings deal 20% bonus damage to enemies who have at least one of their Rival Traits. This effect is only active when you have exactly 1 unique God-King.

traits.name: Invoker
traits.description: All allies gain extra Mana from their attacks.

traits.name: Knight
traits.description: All allies block a flat amount of damage from all sources.

traits.name: Legionnaire
traits.description: Legionnaires gain bonus Attack Speed, and their first attack after casting an Ability heals them for 50% of the damage dealt.

traits.name: Mystic
traits.description: All allies gain Magic Resist.

traits.name: Ranger
traits.description: Rangers gain bonus Attack Speed every 4 seconds, and lose it every 4 seconds, This effect begins 4 seconds after combat starts.

traits.name: Renewer
traits.description: Skirmishers gain a shield at the start of combat, and bonus Attack Damage each second.

traits.name: Skirmisher
traits.description: Skirmishers gain a shield at the start of combat, and bonus Attack Damage each second.

traits.name: Spellweaver
traits.description: Spellweavers have bonus Ability Power, which increases whenever any champion uses an ability (up to 10 times).

traits.name: Abomination
traits.innate: When 3 allied champions have died, the Monstrosity will rise from its grave. The Monstrosity receives bonus Health and Attack Damage based on allied Abomination champions' star levels.
traits.description: The 3 Abomination champions nearest the grave will also grant the Monstrosity a random copy of one of their items when combat starts.

traits.name: Coven
traits.description: At the start of combat, the champion nearest to the center of your Coven champions is chosen as the Coven Leader, gaining 60% bonus Ability Power.

sets.active: Each time a Coven champion casts, 15% of the cost is bestowed upon the Coven Leader as Mana.

traits.name: Dawnbringer
traits.description: Dawnbringers rapidly heal some of their maximum Health the first time they drop below 50%. When this occurs, all allied Dawnbringers gain 10% bonus damage.

traits.name: Draconic
traits.description: In Hyper Roll, dragon eggs hatch a lot faster!

sets.active: At the end of each player combat, gain a dragon egg on your bench. The bigger the egg, the longer it takes to hatch, and the rarer the reward.
Dragon eggs are golden! Golden eggs hatch into even rarer loot.

traits.name: Dragonslayer
traits.description: After the first Dragonslayer ally scores a takedown on an enemy with at least 1400 maximum Health, all allies gain additional Ability Power for the rest of the round.

sets.active: 30% Ability Power for Dragonslayers, 20% for team
70% Ability Power for Dragonslayers, 50% for team

traits.name: Eternal
traits.description: Wolf separates from Lamb, and can be placed anywhere on the battlefield. Wolf does not count toward your team size, and receives all of Lamb's stat bonuses.

traits.name: Forgotten
traits.description: Forgotten champions have bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power. Each Shadow item held by a Forgotten champion increases these bonuses by 10% on all Forgotten champions, stacking up to 4 times.

traits.name: Hellion
traits.description: Whenever a Hellion dies, a Doppelhellion (a one less star copy) will leap from the Hellion portal and join the fight!

traits.name: Ironclad
traits.description: All allies gain Armor.

traits.name: Nightbringer
traits.description: Nightbringers gain a shield for 8 seconds equal to a percent of their maximum Health the first time they drop below 50%. When this occurs, that Nightbringer gains bonus damage.

traits.name: Redeemed
traits.description: Redeemed champions have increased Armor, Magic Resist, and Ability Power. When they die, their bonus is split among remaining Redeemed allies.

traits.name: Revenant
traits.description: Revenants revive after their first death each combat. Once revived, they take and deal 30% increased damage.

traits.name: Verdant
traits.description: Champions that start combat adjacent to at least one Verdant ally are immune to crowd control for a duration.

items.name: B.F. Sword
items.description: Gain Attack Damage.

items.name: Recurve Bow
items.description: Gain Attack Speed.

items.name: Needlessly Large Rod
items.description: Gain Spell Power.

items.name: Tear of the Goddess
items.description: Gain Mana.

items.name: Chain Vest
items.description: Gain Armor.

items.name: Negatron Cloak
items.description: Gain Magic Resist.

items.name: Giant's Belt
items.description: Gain Health.

items.name: Spatula
items.description: It must do something...

items.name: Sparring Gloves
items.description: Gain Critical Strike Chance and Dodge Chance.

items.name: Deathblade
items.description: Contributing to a kill grants the holder additional Attack Damage for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.

items.name: Giant Slayer
items.description: The holder's Abilities and attacks do bonus damage. If the target has more health, the bonus damage increases.

items.name: Hextech Gunblade
items.description: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heal them for a percentage of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder.

items.name: Spear of Shojin
items.description: The holder's Basic Attacks restore additional Mana.

items.name: Guardian Angel
items.description: Prevents the holder's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After a short delay, they return with restored Health and shed all negative effects.

items.name: Bloodthirster
items.description: Physical damage heals the holder for a percentage of the damage dealt.

items.name: Zeke's Herald
items.description: When combat begins, the holder and all nearby allies in the same row gain Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

items.name: Skirmisher Emblem
items.description: The holder gains the Skirmisher trait.

items.name: Infinity Edge
items.description: Grants Critical Strike Chance (including components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes bonus Critical Strike Damage.

items.name: Rapid Firecannon
items.description: Increases the holder's Attack Range and grants bonus Attack Speed (including components). The holder's attacks can no longer miss.

items.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
items.description: Attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. This bonus Attack Speed can stack any number of times.

items.name: Statikk Shiv
items.description: Every third attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist for several seconds.

items.name: Titan's Resolve
items.description: When the holder takes damage or inflicts a critical strike, they gain a stacking Attack Damage and Ability Power bonus.  This stacks up to a limit, at which point the holder gains Armor and Magic Resistance.

items.name: Runaan's Hurricane
items.description: The holder's attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing a percentage of the holder's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critically strike.

items.name: Zz'Rot Portal
items.description: At the start of combat, the holder taunts nearby enemies. When the holder dies, a Voidspawn arises taunting nearby enemies. Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are only partially effective.

items.name: Legionnaire Emblem
items.description: The holder gains the Legionnaire trait.

items.name: Last Whisper
items.description: When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced for several seconds. This effect does not stack.

items.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
items.description: Grants a percentage bonus Ability Power (including components).

items.name: Archangel's Staff
items.description: Each time the holder casts their Ability, they gain Ability Power equal to a percentage of their maximum Mana.

items.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
items.description: When combat begins, the holder and nearby allies in the same row gain a shield that blocks damage for several seconds.

items.name: Ionic Spark
items.description: Nearby enemies have their Magic Resist reduced (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to a percentage of their max Mana.

items.name: Morellonomicon
items.description: When the holder deals magic or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing a percentage of the target's maximum Health as true damage over several seconds, and reducing healing for the duration of the burn.

items.name: Spellweaver Emblem
items.description: The holder gains the Spellweaver trait.

items.name: Jeweled Gauntlet
items.description: The holder's magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The holder gains bonus Critical Strike Damage.

items.name: Blue Buff
items.description: After casting their Ability, the holder gains Mana.

items.name: Frozen Heart
items.description: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies.

items.name: Chalice of Power
items.description: When combat begins, the holder and all nearby allies in the same row gain Spell Power for the rest of combat.

items.name: Redemption
items.description: Periodically, the holder radiates an aura to nearby allies, healing them a percentage of their missing Health. Affected allies take reduced damage from multi-target abilities and attacks for several seconds.

items.name: Renewer Emblem
items.description: The holder gains the Renewer trait.

items.name: Hand of Justice
items.description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder's basic attacks and spells deal additional damage or heal for a percentage of damage dealt.

items.name: Bramble Vest
items.description: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal magic damage to all nearby enemies every couple seconds.

items.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
items.description: The holder gains Armor and Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

items.name: Sunfire Cape
items.description: Periodically, a random nearby enemy is burned a percentage of their maximum Health over several seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced.

items.name: Ironclad Emblem
items.description: The holder gains the Ironclad trait.

items.name: Shroud of Stillness
items.description: When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana until they cast.

items.name: Dragon's Claw
items.description: Grants bonus Magic Resist (including components).

items.name: Zephyr
items.description: When combat begins, the holder summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for several seconds. Ignores CC immunity.

items.name: Redeemed Emblem
items.description: The holder gains the Redeemed trait.

items.name: Quicksilver
items.description: The holder is immune to crowd control for the first several seconds of combat.

items.name: Warmog's Armor
items.description: Grants bonus Health (including components).

items.name: Dawnbringer Emblem
items.description: The holder gains the Dawnbringer trait.

items.name: Trap Claw
items.description: Blocks the first enemy Ability that hits the holder, and stuns the Ability's caster for several seconds.

items.name: Force of Nature
items.description: The holder's maximum team size is incrased.

items.name: Assassin Emblem
items.description: The holder gains the Assassin trait.

items.name: Thief's Gloves
items.description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level. [Consumes Three Item Slots. Cannot Grant Shadow Items]

items.name: Shadow Sword
items.description: Gain Attack Damage.

items.name: Shadow Bow
items.description: Gain Attack Speed.

items.name: Shadow Rod
items.description: Gain Spell Power.

items.name: Shadow Tear
items.description: Gain Mana.

items.name: Shadow Vest
items.description: Gain Armor.

items.name: Shadow Cloak
items.description: Gain Magic Resist.

items.name: Shadow Belt
items.description: Gain Health.

items.name: Shadow Spatula
items.description: It must do something evil...

items.name: Shadow Gloves
items.description: Gain Critical Strike Chance and Dodge Chance.

items.name: Caustic Deathblade
items.description: Contributing to a kill grants the holder additional Attack Damage for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.
items.shadowPenalty: The holder starts with a percentage of their maximum Health.

items.name: Evil Giantslayer
items.description: The holder's Abilities and attacks do bonus damage.
items.shadowPenalty: If the target is below a certain Health, the holder's Abilities and attacks do decreased damage.

items.name: Hextech Gunblade of Immortality
items.description: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heals the nearest ally with missing Health for a percentage of the damage dealt.
items.shadowPenalty: This heal cannot affect the holder.

items.name: Spectral Spear of Shojin
items.description: The holder's attacks restore additional Mana.
items.shadowPenalty: The holder deals less damage.

items.name: Fallen Guardian Angel
items.description: Prevents the holder's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After a short delay, they return with restored Health and shed all negative effects.
items.shadowPenalty: After this effect triggers, the holder's Attack Speed is reduced for the rest of combat.

items.name: Riskthirster
items.description: Physical damage heals the holder for a percentage of the damage dealt.
items.shadowBonus: Each time the holder heals to a percentage Health, they gain a percentage Attack Speed for several seconds.
items.shadowPenalty: The holder takes a percentage of their maximum Health in true damage at the beginning of combat or upon being equipped.

items.name: Zeke's Bleak Herald
items.description: When combat begins, the holder reduces the Attack Speed of all nearby allies within in the same row. The holder then gains Attack Speed for each affected ally.

items.name: Forgotten Emblem
items.description: The holder gains the Forgotten trait.

items.name: Sacrificial Infinity Edge
items.description: Grants Critical Strike Chance (including components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes bonus Critical Strike Damage.
items.shadowBonus: The holder also gains bonus Critical Strike Damage.
items.shadowPenalty: Each time the holder critically strikes, they deal a percentage of their maximum Health to themselves as true damage.

items.name: Rapid Deathcannon
items.description: Increases the holder's Attack Range and grants bonus Attack Speed (including components) when there are no enemies nearby. The holder's attacks can no longer miss.

items.name: Guinsoo's Sacrificial Rageblade
items.description: Attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. This bonus Attack Speed can stack any number of times.
items.shadowPenalty: The holder is dealt a percentage of their maximum Health as true damage each attack.

items.name: Statikk Stiletto
items.description: Every other attack from the holder unleashes chain lightning that strikes nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist for several seconds.
items.shadowPenalty: The holder has their Attack Damage reduced.

items.name: Titan's Revenge
items.description: Periodically, the holder's next attack deals a percentage of the total damage they have taken since the last empowered attack as true damage.

items.name: Runaan's Untamed Hurricane
items.description: The holder's attacks fire bolts at nearby enemies, dealing a percentage of the holder's Attack Damage. These bolts can critically strike but do not apply on-hit effects.

items.name: Unstable Zz'Rot Portal
items.description: At the start of combat, the holder taunts nearby enemies. When the holder dies, an Unstable Voidspawn arises and taunts enemies again. When it dies it deals true damage to nearby enemies. Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are only partially effective.

items.name: Hellion Emblem
items.description: The holder gains the Hellion trait.

items.name: Final Whisper
items.description: When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor and Magic Resist are reduced for several seconds.
items.shadowPenalty: The holder's Armor and Magic Resist are also permanently reduced.

items.name: Rabadon's Caustic Deathcap
items.description: Grants a percentage bonus Ability Power (including components).
items.shadowPenalty: The holder receives reduced maximum Health.

items.name: Archdemon's Staff
items.description: Each time the holder casts their Ability, they gain empty maximum Health equal to a percentage of their maximum Mana. The holder then heals for that amount.

items.name: Locket of the Silver Lunari
items.description: When combat begins, the holder and nearby allies in the same row gain bonus Armor and Magic Resist.
items.shadowPenalty: Affected allies gain less Mana per attack.

items.name: Ionic Dark-Spark
items.description: Nearby enemies and allies (except the holder) are zapped when they cast an ability, taking magic damage equal to a percentage of their max Mana.
items.shadowBonus: Whenever an ally or enemy is zapped, the holder gains Ability Power for the rest of combat.

items.name: Mor-evil-lonomicon
items.description: When the holder deals magic or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing a percentage of the target's maximum Health as true damage over several seconds, and reducing healing for the duration of the burn.
items.shadowPenalty: The holder's Ability deals less damage.

items.name: Dragonslayer Emblem
items.description: The holder gains the Dragonslayer trait.

items.name: Sacrificial Gauntlet
items.description: The holder's magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The holder gains bonus Critical Strike Damage and bonus Critical Strike Chance.
items.shadowPenalty: Each time the holder casts their Ability, they deal a percentage of their maximum Health to themselves as true damage.

items.name: Very Dark Blue Buff
items.description: After casting their Ability, the holder gains Mana.
items.shadowBonus: If the holder is below a percentage of their Health, the Mana gained is increased.

items.name: Frozen Dark Heart
items.description: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies.
items.shadowPenalty: The Attack Speed of nearby allies (except the holder) is reduced.

items.name: Chalice of Malice
items.description: When combat begins, all of the holder's nearby allies in the same row gain Spell Power for the rest of combat.
items.shadowPenalty: The holder loses Ability Power instead of gaining any.

items.name: Sacrificial Redemption
items.description: Periodically, the holder radiates an aura to all allies on the board except themself, healing them a percentage of their missing Health.
items.shadowPenalty: Each time this happens, the holder damages themself a percentage of their current Health as true damage.

items.name: Coven Emblem
items.description: The holder gains the Coven trait.

items.name: Hand of Vengeance
items.description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder's basic attacks and spells deal additional damage or heal for a percentage of damage dealt.
items.shadowPenalty: These bonuses expire after each takedown, and renew on the next.

items.name: Refracted Bramble Vest
items.description: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal magic damage to all nearby enemies every couple seconds.

items.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate of Immortality
items.description: The holder heals themself periodically for each enemy targeting them.

items.name: Eclipse Cape
items.description: Periodically, a random nearby enemy is burned a percentage of their maximum Health over several seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced.
items.shadowPenalty: The holder is also burned for a percentage of their maximum Health every second for the entirety of combat, and any healing they receive is reduced.

items.name: Cavalier Emblem
items.description: The holder gains the Cavalier trait.

items.name: Dark Shroud of Stillness
items.description: When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead and behind that delays affected enemies' and other allies' first ability cast, increasing their maximum Mana until they cast.

items.name: Refracted Dragon's Claw
items.description: Reduces incoming magic damage by a percentage.
items.shadowBonus: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits.

items.name: Turbulent Zephyr
items.description: When combat begins, the holder summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for several seconds. Ignores CC immunity.
items.shadowPenalty: Once the enemy returns to combat, they gain Attack Damage and Ability Power for the rest of combat.

items.name: Revenant Emblem
items.description: The holder gains the Revenant trait.

items.name: Caustic Quicksilver
items.description: The holder is immune to crowd control for the entirety of combat and receives reduced Health.

items.name: Warmog's Sacrificial Armor
items.description: Grants bonus Health (including components).
items.shadowPenalty: The holder takes true damage each second.

items.name: Nightbringer Emblem
items.description: The holder gains the Nightbringer trait.

items.name: Vengeful Trap Claw
items.description: Blocks the first enemy Ability that hits the holder, then teleports them to the Ability's caster, and causes both units to start targeting each other. They deal increased damage to each other.

items.name: Force of Darkness
items.description: The holder's maximum team size is incrased.
items.shadowPenalty: The player's Little Legend takes increased percentage damage after losing a battle.

items.name: Abomination Emblem
items.description: The holder gains the Abomination trait.

items.name: Trickster's Glove
items.description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equips 2 temporary items. These are always full shadow items. [Consumes Three Item Slots]
